definition: Yu Dafu (1896-1945), poet and novelist
elegant
surname Yu
surname Da
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: Yu Dafu's creative style is very unique in the history of the Chinese literature.
sentences.chinese: 郁達夫的創作風格在中國新文學史上獨具特色。

sentences.english: One feature of YU Dafus works is the autobiographic style.
sentences.chinese: 郁達夫作品的突出特色之一，就是自敘傳的文體。

sentences.english: The obvious feature of Yu Dafu's works is the emotionally internal tendency.
sentences.chinese: 情感的內化性傾向是郁達夫小說創作的突出特點。

definition: Zhang Shizhao (1881-1973), revolutionary journalist in Shanghai, then established writer

Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
Tang Xianzu (1550-1616), Ming poet and dramatist, author of The Peony Pavilion 牡丹亭[Mu3 dan5 Ting2]
